content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column bgcolor=”#ffffff”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1581932238629{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}” el_id=”section-about”][vc_column_inner]

SAVINGS AND RECURRING DEPOSIT RATES

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1671608364581{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

Savings Deposit Rate: 3.50%
Recurring deposit rates applicable as per term deposit rates

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Invest your money with GSC Bank for a tenure anywhere between 7 days to 5 years and earn interest over the deposited amount. As one of the most traditional and safest means to invest, many people prefer it for wealth creation. Fixed deposits is a good choice for people who have some extra lump sum amount, which they don’t need to use at the time. It ensures capital protection as well as a uniform flow of income, Senior citizens will get an additional interest rates of 0.50% P.A.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”4932″ img_size=”large” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_border”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner]

RATES FOR INDIVIDUALS, TRUST, HOUSING SOCIETIES & HUF (W. E. F. 17/03/2023)*

[vc_column_text]

TENURE Interest Rates
07 DAYS TO 45 DAYS 4.25%
46 DAYS TO 90 DAYS 4.25%
91 DAYS TO 120 DAYS 4.50%
121 DAYS TO 179 DAYS 4.50%
180 DAYS TO 269 DAYS 5.75%
270 DAYS TO 364 DAYS 5.75%
12 MONTHS (365 DAYS) 7.25%
366 DAYS TO 24 MONTHS 7.25%
MORE THAN 2 YEARS AND UP TO 3 YEARS 6.75%
MORE THAN 3 YEARS AND UP TO 5 YEARS 6.75%
TAX SAVING DEPOSIT SCHEME FOR 60 MONTHS 5.00%

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

    • Senior citizens (60 years or above) will get an additional 0.50% more interest

    • “For fixed deposits of Rs 1 Crore and above in a single deposit placed for 12 months (365 days) by individual customers only will get 0.25% extra on regular interest rate.”

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1632971437960{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

RATES FOR BANKS, PACS & OTHER INSTITUTIONS (W. E. F. 01/08/2023)*

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1690873158018{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

TENURE BANKS, PACS & OTHER INSTITUTIONS
07 DAYS TO 45 DAYS 4.75%
46 DAYS TO 90 DAYS 5.00%
91 DAYS TO 120 DAYS 5.25%
121 DAYS TO 179 DAYS 5.25%
180 DAYS TO 269 DAYS 5.60%
270 DAYS TO 364 DAYS 6.00%
12 MONTHS (365 DAYS) 7.25%
366 DAYS TO 24 MONTHS 6.50%
24 MONTHS & 1 DAY 6.25%

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column bgcolor=”#fafcfd”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1581932860744{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}” el_id=”section-typeloan”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1581932884781{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]

PRODUCTS & SERVICES WE PROVIDE

[vc_column_text css_animation=”none”]

  • Savings Bank Account
  • Current Bank Account
  • Junior Bank Account
  • Fixed Deposit
  • Insurance
  • E-stamping
  • Auto Vault (24×7×365 open Smart Lockers)
  • Recurring Deposit
  • Safe Deposit Lockers
  • Franking Facility
  • RTGS/NEFT/IMPS/UPI
  • Mobile Banking/Net Banking

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1482200231611{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”5px”]

Locate Us

For any query regarding FD/RD please contact nearest branch of GSC Bank, to open Fixed Deposits / Recurring Deposits.

Branch & ATM Locator

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1583900518927{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

*Interest rates are subject to change without prior notice

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
